name: Emma_Watson_for_Comics
description:
The model trained on photographs by Emma Watson.

The best result is obtained with a power of 0.8-0.9

Attention: DO NOT USE the promt "Emma Watson" or "Hermione Granger" if your models already know what these characters look like. Will cause the break due to overlays.

LoRa best used without special words for promt.

Модель обучена на фотографиях Эммы Уотсон.

Лучший результат получается при силле 0.8-0.9

ВНИМАНИЕ: НЕ ИСПОЛЬЗУЙТЕ промт "Эмма Уотсон" или "Гермиона Грейнджер" если ваши модели уже знают, как выглядят эти персонажи. Вызовет поломку изображения из-за наложений. ЛоРа применяется без специальных слов для промта.

meta.prompt: upperbody portreit of 18 years old teen, (happy: 1.5), hogwarts uniform,hogwartd background, frontal view <lora:ComicsEmmaWatson:0.9>
meta.negativePrompt: bw, worst quality, low quality, (deformed, distorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, (mutated hands and fingers:1.4), disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, blurry, amputation, cloned

meta.prompt: upperbody portreit of young teen, (happy: 1.5), hogwarts uniform,hogwartd background, frontal view <lora:ComicsEmmaWatson:0.9>
meta.negativePrompt: bw, worst quality, low quality, (deformed, distorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, (mutated hands and fingers:1.4), disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, blurry, amputation, cloned

meta.prompt: upperbody portreit of young teen, (happy: 1.5), hogwarts uniform,hogwartd background, frontal view <lora:ComicsEmmaWatson:0.9>
meta.negativePrompt: bw, worst quality, low quality, (deformed, distorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, (mutated hands and fingers:1.4), disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, blurry, amputation, cloned
